white: A scientist jumping through a window to greet you.
Assuming the Aperture Science Party Submission Position.
Stomping some hippies in a carpark.
Stealing some guy's blood because a voice over the phone told you to.
Opening fire on a crowd of what may or may not be real zombies.
Plummeting to death in an elevator.
A boat full of bikini-clad witches.
Speaking in an accent beyond anyone's range of hearing.
Testing the Schrödinger's cat theory with neurotoxin.
Having your flashlight run out of power and spawning zombies infront of you.
How I lost my medical license.
Being so close to death that everything is in black and white.
Giant forearms and stubby little legs.
Beating up Santa in front of hundreds of families.
Smearing yourself in the juices of dead bodies.
A bottle of 'Kill Me Come Back Stronger' pills.
Lining people up against a wall and shooting them.
The part where he kills you.
A shady conman, a sassy coffee runner, an overweight football coach, and a friendly hillbilly.
A pair of earbuds worth hundreds of dollars.
Running naked through the streets of City 17.
Shooting five needles of adrenaline into your arm and stopping time.
Two of every animal on earth.
An unusual Team Captain with the Burning Flames effect.
Exploding your friend's heart while they're on life support.
A crazy prophet waving around a shotgun laughing maniacally.
Col. Odessa Cubbage, at your service!.
Rewriting the English canon to include busting ghosts.
Going through the Citadel with an overpowered Gravity Gun.
ÜberCharging an enemy spy and helping them kill your team.
Rocketjumping and stomping an enemy with the Mantreads.
Programming the HEV suit to do some sweet dance moves.
A book about the Laws of Robotics.
Two raw bacon strips held up in a wind tunnel.
Burning down a small town to The Lovin' Spoonful's 'Do You Believe In Magic'.
Alyx repeatedly getting pierced in the back.
Killing your parents because you knew where this was going.
The 'Bombs for the Poor' non-profit charity.
Having third degree burns over 95% of your body.
Typing 'unbind all' in the developer console.
Getting the highscore at a Manhack Arcade.
Archimedes ripping through a torso like a chestburster.
A suitcase full of pistols and money.
Pyroland, where all your dreams come true!.
Waking up in a hospital, stealing a pair of bonesaws, and going on a rampage.
The severed heads of your worst enemies.
Rubbing bugbait all over your privates.
Paying $15 for a subscription to Breencast.
Running through the Black Mesa lobby and killing all the employees.
Accepting a $100 'Glorious Meat Cannon' in Team Fortress 2.
Garry Newman screaming at his computer.
Throwing hundreds of snarks on the floor.
Some kind of self-aware beauty mark.
SWAT teams climbing on one another to form a tower.
Indie games trying to be deep and meaningful.
Propelling yourself into the air with a well-timed explosion.
Dr. Kleiner telling everybody to procreate over City 17's broadcasting system.
Buying the $100 ring in Team Fortress 2 and getting rejected.
Dr. Judith Mossman in a dominatrix suit.
Plowing through groups of infected people in a race car.
Putting money on DOG during the race to White Forest then losing deliberately.
The HEV suit voice talking dirty.
Getting your brain sucked out by an Advisor.
Throwing an empty can at the Metro Police.
Slapping tripmines on the walls and jumping on them.
John Freeman (who was Gordon Freeman's brother).
Spamming the laugh command while getting beaten to death.
The Soldier, naked and covered in honey.
Unironically thinking exaggerated faces in Machinima is funny.
The helicopter chase through the sewers of City 17.
Driving an airboat off some suspiciously placed ramps.
Being horribly racist towards the Vortigaunts.
Sticking your dick into a Hivehand and thrusting to shoot bees.
Pictures of the Spy having sexual congress with the Eiffel Tower.
Shutting the saferoom door on a friend and watching them get mauled by zombies.
Banging on a bathroom stall door while someone tries to take a shit.
An industrial-sized tube spraying out semen.
Pictures of your mother having sex with a masked stranger.
Shitting into an excursion funnel and watching it float away.
Having sex with your partner while they turn into a zombie.
An optimistic black guy, a skinhead biker, a Vietnam veteran, and a horror movie nut.
Nathan Vetterlein welcoming you to his dick.
Murdering your friend for shits and giggles.
Pulling bugbait out of a dead Antlion Guardian's ass.
The Team Fortress 2 Administrator phone sex hotline.
Masturbating to poorly posed ragdolls in Garry's Mod.
Using a headcrab to fulfill sexual desires.
Putting up scat porn in an unavoidable area.
